verses.verse: <S%H6662>Righteous<s%> are <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord, when I <S%H7378>plead<s%> with <S%H1696>you<s%>: yet let me talk with you of your <S%H4941>judgments<s%>: Why does the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6743>prosper<s%>? why are all they <S%H7951>happy<s%> that deal <S%H899>very<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%>?

You have <S%H5193>planted<s%> <S%H8327>them<s%>, Yes, they have taken root: they <S%H3212>grow<s%>, <S%H6213>Yes<s%>, they bring forth <S%H6529>fruit<s%>: you are <S%H7138>near<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and far <S%H7350>from<s%> their <S%H3629>minds<s%>.

But <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord, <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H7200>me<s%>: you have seen <S%H974>me<s%>, and tried my <S%H3820>heart<s%> toward <S%H5423>you<s%>: pull them out like <S%H6629>sheep<s%> for the <S%H2878>slaughter<s%>, and <S%H6942>prepare<s%> them for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2028>slaughter<s%>.

How long shall the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H56>mourn<s%>, and the <S%H6212>herbs<s%> of every <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H3001>wither<s%>, for the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of them that <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H929>it<s%>? the animals are <S%H5595>consumed<s%>, and the <S%H5775>birds<s%>; because they <S%H559>said<s%>, He shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> our last <S%H319>end<s%>.

If you have <S%H7323>run<s%> with the <S%H7273>footmen<s%>, and they have <S%H3811>wearied<s%> <S%H8474>you<s%>, then how can you contend with <S%H5483>horses<s%>? and if in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%>, where you <S%H982>trusted<s%>, they wearied <S%H6213>you<s%>, then how will you do in the <S%H1347>swelling<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>?

For even your <S%H251>brothers<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of your <S%H1>father<s%>, even they have dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%> with <S%H7121>you<s%>; Yes, they have called a <S%H4392>multitude<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H539>you<s%>: believe them <S%H1696>not<s%>, though they speak fair words unto <S%H2896>you<s%>.

I have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> my <S%H1004>house<s%>, I have <S%H5203>left<s%> my <S%H5159>heritage<s%>; I have <S%H5414>given<s%> the dearly <S%H3033>beloved<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul<s%> into the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of her <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
My <S%H5159>heritage<s%> is unto me as a <S%H738>lion<s%> in the <S%H3293>forest<s%>; it cries <S%H5414>out<s%> against <S%H8130>me<s%>: therefore have I hated it.

My <S%H5159>heritage<s%> is unto me as a <S%H6641>speckled<s%> <S%H5861>bird<s%>, the <S%H5861>birds<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> are against <S%H3212>her<s%>; come <S%H622>you<s%>, assemble all the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, <S%H857>come<s%> to <S%H402>devour<s%>.

<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H7462>pastors<s%> have <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> my <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, they have <S%H947>trodden<s%> my <S%H2513>portion<s%> under <S%H947>foot<s%>, they have <S%H5414>made<s%> my <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H2513>portion<s%> a <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

They have <S%H7760>made<s%> it <S%H8076>desolate<s%>, and being <S%H8077>desolate<s%> it <S%H56>mourns<s%> unto <S%H776>me<s%>; the whole land is made <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, because no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7760>lays<s%> it to <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

The <S%H7703>spoilers<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> upon all high <S%H8205>places<s%> through the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: for the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> from the one <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> even to the other <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>: no <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall have <S%H7965>peace<s%>.

They have <S%H2232>sown<s%> <S%H2406>wheat<s%>, but shall <S%H7114>reap<s%> <S%H6975>thorns<s%>: they have put themselves to <S%H2470>pain<s%>, but shall not <S%H3276>profit<s%>: and they shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of your <S%H8393>fruits<s%> because of the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> against all my <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7934>neighbors<s%>, that <S%H5060>touch<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> which I have caused my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5157>inherit<s%>; <S%H5428>Behold<s%>, I will pluck them out of their <S%H127>land<s%>, and pluck <S%H5428>out<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> from among <S%H8432>them<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H310>pass<s%>, after that I have plucked them <S%H5428>out<s%> I will <S%H7725>return<s%>, and have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on <S%H7725>them<s%>, and will bring them again, every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H5159>heritage<s%>, and every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H776>land<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H3925>pass<s%>, if they will diligently <S%H3925>learn<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, to <S%H7650>swear<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%>, The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2416>lives<s%>; as they <S%H3925>taught<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H1168>Baal<s%>; then shall they be <S%H1129>built<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>.
But if they will not <S%H8085>obey<s%>, I will <S%H5428>utterly<s%> pluck <S%H5428>up<s%> and <S%H6>destroy<s%> that <S%H1471>nation<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
